summary: Scimitar one handed sword, recolored and retextured with runes.
descriptionHtml:
Same as the robe and hood, I just like to do my own stuff if I can and after the response to the punisher robe I will continue uploading my mods as soon as I finished them. :)

Unpack the files into:
Skyrim\\Data\\Textures

The Path is given in the zipped folders.
Hope you enjoy it and if you like it, feel free to share I don\'t claime any copyrights. ;)
author: RavenCane
